tooltip_status_wb7_content4.message: Difficulty: shows how hard you've studied this word. The more incorrect answers you gave in Daily Challenge, the more difficult the word is.

tooltip_status_wb7_content5.message: Number of reviews: shows how many times you have reviewed the word.

tooltip_status_wb7_content6.message: Word link: shows the word origin. Not all words will have word link information.

desc_about_us.message: eJOY extension is an English-learning tool developed by eJOY Learning. We're funded by our users community who use eJOY extension to improve their English skills every day.

What_are_quick_actions_desc.message:
eJOY AI can be easily accessed through Quick Actions, which offers an easy way to process selected text.
As soon as you select any text on a web page, a float button appears, enabling you to instantly translate, rewrite or explain the text with just one click. In addition, you can rearrange the order of the tools for even more convenience.

What_are_sidebar_functions_desc.message:
It contains Summarise and Deep Dive feature:
1. The AI Summarise assists in summarizing videos or articles and extracting relevant information.
2. The AI Deep Dive simplifies complex concepts or terms by providing clear explanations, real-life examples, quizzes, and prompting questions for better understanding.

Rewrite_desc.message: Rewrite any selected text with correct grammar

idioms_desc.message: Detect idioms and phrases in the selected text

DeepDaily_desc.message: Study the selected text with simple explanation, example and quizzes

Explain_desc.message: Explain any selected text in simple terms

Grammar_desc.message: Explain grammar structure in the selected text

desc_converted.message: This wordbook has been converted to eJOY 2. You can only view the word list here.

OpenAI_API_desc.message: The official OpenAI API is more stable and charges are based on usage. Follow the guide to get the API key. You can find or create your API key here:

Azure_API_desc.message: eJOY AI has been constructed, developed, and tailored using Azure OpenAI services to provide an exceptional user experience for eJOY's users.

ChatGPT_WebApp_desc.message: Staying logged in to your ChatGPT account on the website is essential. Due to OpenAI's limitations, both free and Plus users may experience unstable performance. ChatGPT Plus users are advised to use the service.

disableQuickActionDesc.message: Once turned off, the eJOY AI Quick Actions will no longer appear when you select text.

descConfirmConvert.message: After the conversion, you can not be able to save new words to {0} temporarily. We are working to solve this issue now.
